system.description:
Your mastery over both your elemental magic and your own body has grown, allowing you a measure of versatility that is the envy of even other elementalist and adepts. You gain the following benefits:

  • When you would gain a Practiced Technique or an Elemental Adaptation, you can choose freely from either list.
  • Half your adept levels count as elementalist levels for the purpose of determining the damage dealt by your Elemental Blast feature.
  • Half your elementalist levels count as adept levels for the purpose of determining the size of your martial arts die.
  • You can use Flurry of Blows after using your Elemental Blast feature.
